EmailTemplate.name: CC Decline
EmailTemplate.subject: RH CONTRACT ORDER# {!RH_Order__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.Name},
Thank you for shopping with RH. We are contacting you in regards to your order# {!RH_Order__c.Name}, as we have been unable to obtain authorization for the charges to your credit card.
I am happy to contact you at your earliest convenience. Please provide a phone number I can call you directly at to help get this matter resolved.
For your security, please do not send any credit card information via email.
Thank you,
Todd Harvey Leader, Accounts Receivable RH CONTRACT
